en.title: Pay your application fee
en.paragraph2: . Your application will not be submitted until you have paid.
en.line2: You will need a valid debit or credit card. If you cannot pay now, save the application and return to it when you are ready.
en.paragraph4: . You may be able to get help paying the fee if you:
en.reason2: have a little saving or no saving or

cy.paragraph1: The divorce application fee is £, (in welsh)
cy.paragraph2: .Your application will not be submitted until you have paid. (in Welsh)
cy.line2: You will need a valid debit or credit card. If you cannot pay now, save the application and return to it when you are ready. (in welsh)
cy.paragraph4: . You may be able to get help paying the fee if you: (in welsh)
cy.reason2: have a little saving or no saving or (welsh)
